net.proteusframework.cms.component.generator

Interface Renderer<T extends PageElement>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the datasource type.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DelegateRenderer<T>, Generator<T>, ScriptGenerator<G>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScriptGenerator, CmsIntegration, DelegateGenerator, DelegatePurposeLayoutGenerator, GeneratorImpl, HTMLBoxGenerator, HTMLPageGenerator, MIWTGenerator, MIWTRenderer, PageSyndicationGenerator, PassthroughGenerator, ProxyGenerator, SAMLLoginGenerator, SAMLProxy, SequentialGenerator, SocialLoginGenerator, XMLGenerator, XMLRenderer

    public interface Renderer<T extends PageElement>
    Renderer for content.
    It is guaranteed that the following methods will called in the order listed.
    • preRenderProcess
    • getNDEs
    • render
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getNDEs

        java.util.List<net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.html.NDE> getNDEs()
        Get the NDEs needed by the generated content.

        The NDEs should be assembled in the preRenderProcess method. See the class level javadoc for order of method calls. The ProcessChain will gather the NDEs of any Renderers or PageElements that are delegated to.

        Returns:
        the NDEs.

      • preRenderProcess

        void preRenderProcess(@NonNull CmsRequest<T> request,
                      @NonNull CmsResponse response,
                      @NonNull ProcessChain chain)
        Process the request. Smart implementations should check to see if anything needs to be done before doing any work.
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        response - the response.
        chain - the process chain.

      • render

        void render(@NonNull CmsRequest<T> request,
            @NonNull CmsResponse response,
            @NonNull RenderChain chain)
     throws java.io.IOException
        Render the response.
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        response - the response.
        chain - the render chain.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs rendering.
